title: MRF Laboratorium
text:
Welcome to MRF Laboratorium
MRF Laboratorium is personal website as a repository of my works, thoughts, and tricks & tips written in the form of an (research) articles. The goals of this website is to provide a high quality content and trusted articles for computer science’s stuff like algorithms, technology and others.

title: Welcome To My Blog

title: Muhammad Reza Fahlevi
text:
Research

Published:

Muhammad Reza Fahlevi, & Budiman, M. A. (2021). Computing the Value of Pi in the Manner of Lambda Function with R Statistical Programming Lan- guage. Data Science: Journal of Computing and Applied Informatics, 5(1), 39-48. https://doi.org/10.32734/jocai.v5.i1-5556

title: Muhammad Reza Fahlevi
text:
Work Experience


Badan Pusat Statistik Kab. Kampar \(-\) Software Developer Intern. Build a software for Desa Cinta Statistik Desa Laboy Jaya using R Shiny framework (Jul - Aug \(2021\))

title: Muhammad Reza Fahlevi
text:
Projects


 ShinyImageProcessing : An R shiny image processing app simulation contain bluring, RGB filtering, Median filtering, 3 × 3 kernel convolution, generate 3 type of noise in images, and edge detection.
RCGA: A real-coded genetic algorithm for solving real-parameter optimization problem for function in R3 , written in R and Python.
 ilkom : R packages to find critical value of statistics z, t, χ2 , and f for dynamic significance level by using heuristics procedure based on binary search, bisection method, and tabu search.
VNS: Minimizing error sum of square (SSE) of multi-linear regression model using Variable Neighborhood Search for continuous optimization problem.
TSP: Solving Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP) by using Simulated Annealing (SA) and Tabu Search (TS) algorithm.

title: Muhammad Reza Fahlevi
text:
Technical Skills and Interest


Languages: R | Python | Julia | C++ | Rcpp | LaTeX | MySQL | Javascript | HTML | CSS | Bootstrap | Java
Software & Tools: RStudio | Visual Studio Code | Lyx High Level Latex Frontend | VIM | R Shiny | dplyr | ggplot2 | plotly | pandas | Jupyter Lab
Current Interest: (Meta) Heuristics Method | Probability & Statistics | Data Analysis | Design & Analysis Algorithm | Pattern Recognition & Machine Learning | Deep Neural Evolution
Awards: Participant in Province Science Olympiad for Chemistry, year 2017 | Participant in Province English Debate Competition, year 2017

Hi there! I am Muhammad Reza Fahlevi, a computer science alumnus and creator of this website. Thank you for your time and attention for visit my website. The following are short description about my curriculum vitae.

title: Muhammad Reza Fahlevi
section: Welcome honourable reader! I am M. R. Fahlevi, a \(\textit{cum laude}\) computer science fresh graduate 👨‍🎓
text:
Welcome honourable reader! I am M. R. Fahlevi, a \(\textit{cum laude}\) computer science fresh graduate 👨‍🎓

🔭 I’m currently looking for scholarship and promoter for master or doctoral degree 🎓.
📖 I’m currently learning and interested in Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning
📚 A long life learner.
💻 Hobby: Beside reading, writing, and research, I like to compute a things from scratch. For example, computing pseudo random number generator, numerical algorithms, statistics, and (meta) heuristic algorithms.
⚡ Fun fact: The initial motive of developing this website is to get attention of the promoter of Pendidikan Magister menuju Doktor untuk Sarjana Unggul (PMDSU) scholarship (beasiswa PMDSU). So, I may look appeal to the promoter.
🏫 Ambition: Be a lecturer 👨‍🏫 is my ambition and I am determined to be one.
